document.full_text: the new york state court system will lay-off as many as 500 workers in the coming weeks, according to a union memo released on friday, as the state works to close a $10 billion budget gap.
document.title: new york court system to lay-off up to 500 employees: union
lines_and_colors: the new york state court system will lay-off as many as 500 workers in the coming weeks, according to a union memo released on friday, as the state works to close a $10 billion budget gap.
